name: Jumpy Fellow
description:
Welcome to Jumpy Fellow, a game about jumping up to the next platform for as long as you can to escape the Dangerous Substance.

If you're having trouble outrunning the Dangerous Substance, you can jump in the air, but be careful, as this ability is limited and recharges only once every 10 seconds.

Controls ControlPurposeA or ←
Move Left
D or →
Move RightW or ↑Jump
